name: rxr
description: Maintains state for React app with RxJS the Redux way

scripts.check:src: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/rxr.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/rxr.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run check:src && npm run build && check-es3-syntax lib/ --kill
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && npm run docs:clean && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update docs' && git push git@github.com:dacz/rxr gh-pages --force

author: David Cizek <david@origamica.com> (https://twitter.com/dadc)
